text: Balunah â€˜he ahale-kitabagana! Ekati bisayera dike asa-ya amadera madhye o tomadera madhye samana-ye, amara allaha chara an'ya kara'o ibadata karaba na, tamra sathe kona sarika sabyasta karaba na ebam ekamatra allahake chara ka'uke palanakarta banaba na. Tarapara yadi tara sbikara na kare, tahale bale da'o ye, â€˜saksi thaka amara to anugata.
